amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill to administer or pay any special allowance under section 438(b)(2)(B) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 as it relates to provisions of regulations of the Department of Education.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A021) Agreed to by recorded vote: 413 - 3 (Roll no. 436).
